subTitle: Have questions about our PET preforms or manufacturing services? Find answers to common queries below.

faqs.question: What types of PET preforms do you manufacture?
faqs.answer: We specialize in producing high-quality PET preforms for water, juice, and dairy packaging. Our preforms come in various sizes and neck finishes to meet diverse customer requirements.

faqs.question: What is your production capacity?
faqs.answer: Our factory has a monthly production capacity of 100 million PET preforms, supported by 6 state-of-the-art production lines with 72-cavity Milacron machines.

faqs.question: Do you offer custom preform designs?
faqs.answer: Yes, we design and manufacture custom PET preforms tailored to specific customer needs. Our team ensures optimal material distribution and uniform wall thickness for superior performance.

faqs.question: What quality certifications does your factory hold?
faqs.answer: We are certified with ISO 9001:2015 (Quality Management), ISO 14001:2015 (Environmental Management), ISO 45001:2018 (Occupational Health & Safety), and ISO 22000:2018 (Food Safety Management).

faqs.question: Where is your factory located?
faqs.answer: Our factory is located in the New Industrial Area, Doha, Qatar, with a built-up area of 16,000 square meters. The facility is equipped with advanced machinery and skilled professionals.

faqs.question: How do I contact your sales team?
faqs.answer: You can reach our sales team by phone at +974 4441 1305, by email at info@sic-q.com, or by visiting our website at www.sic-q.com.

faqs.question: Do you provide samples for testing?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide samples of our PET preforms for testing and evaluation. Contact us to request samples tailored to your specific requirements.
